project-weaknesses:
- a standard saving mechanism for single file wikis that works on all browsers
My DIY solution (see above) is browser-independent, i.e., no browser extensions are required, but is a bit of a kludge as it requires external tools.
- better documentation, also for developers
ok-to-publish: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
